title: 50 Hours Inside the Most Radioactive Place On Earth (Exclusion Zone of Chernobyl)
author: Yes Theory
description:
âš¡ï¸ SEEK DISCOMFORT: http://seek-discomfort.com/yes-theory
ğŸ™ğŸ¼ Thank you for making these videos possible through your support of Seek Discomfort 

I've been fascinated with Chernobyl since the moment I read about it in history class over 10 years ago. A few months ago I had the opportunity to go explore it after a big snowfall. The stories we heard were both heartbreaking and inspiring. So excited to finally be able to share.

We were all tested for Covid multiple times before filming this episode and no one has showed any symptoms in the months following this trip.

Thank you to:
Nazar Dorosh for the FPV drone shots:
https://www.instagram.com/dorosh.raw

Cory Martin for the cinematography:
https://www.instagram.com/cory.s.martin

Misha for the guidance:
https://private-chernobyl.guide/

And Yuri Tabach for the facilitation of this trip.

âœˆ Book an Adventure: https://travel.yestheory.com/

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY
âº Yes Theory Plus: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTd7KzdwnFE3lm6LCfYDmUQ
ğŸ“ Follow Mattâ€™s Newsletter: http://yestheory.com/newsletter/
ğŸ“¸ Instagram -  https://www.instagram.com/yestheory/
ğŸ¦ Twitter - https://twitter.com/yestheory
ğŸ¬  Facebook- https://www.facebook.com/yestheory/

â˜®ï¸ If you want to join the Yes Fam Facebook group which is 100,000+ of our most engaged and badass community members, you can apply here: 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/yesfam/

ğŸ¥ HOW WE MAKE OUR VIDEOS

ğŸµ Where we find our music:
1- Epidemic Sound. Amazing royalty free music for YouTube. Free 30 day trial here: http://share.epidemicsound.com/wFFbrâ€‹ 

2- Musicbed. Amazing label-quality cinematic music. 30-day free trial here:
http://share.mscbd.fm/YesTheoryâ€‹

3- Artlist. 2 Months Free High Quality Music: https://artlist.io/artlist-70446/?artlist_aid=YesTheory_593&utm_source=affiliate_p&utm_medium=YesTheory_593&utm_campaign=YesTheory_593

ğŸ Our b-roll and stock footage:

2 Months Free Stock Footage Videos: https://artgrid.io/Artgrid-114820?artâ€‹...

For an amazing b-roll and footage library, checkout: http://storyblocks.com/YesTheoryâ€‹

ğŸ“ˆ  Our Most Popular YouTube Videos
ğŸ¬  Traveling to the least visited country in the world: https://youtu.be/ODuEl4oNae0
ğŸ¬  Becoming Superhuman with Iceman Wim Hof: https://youtu.be/8cvhwquPqJ0
ğŸ¬  We Helicopter Bungee Jumped with Will Smith: https://youtu.be/KSu6gRp7UBA

ğŸ™ The Yes Theory Podcast: https://spoti.fi/3sFdq6v

GET IN TOUCH
ğŸŒ Our website -  http://www.yestheory.com 
ğŸŒ Advertise With Us - zack@onedayent.com 
 
Who are we? 
We believe that lifeâ€™s greatest moments and deepest connections exist outside of your comfort zone.

Ask us a Question:
Tweet us @yestheory
